org.apache.juneau.serializer

Class WriterSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Lockable
      • org.apache.juneau.CoreApi
        • org.apache.juneau.serializer.Serializer
          • org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CsvSerializer, JsonSerializer, PlainTextSerializer, RdfSerializer, UonSerializer, XmlSerializer

    public abstract class WriterSerializer
extends Serializer
    Subclass of Serializer for character-based serializers.
    Description:

    This class is typically the parent class of all character-based serializers. It has 2 abstract methods to implement...

    • Serializer.createSession(Object, ObjectMap, Method, Locale, TimeZone, MediaType)
    • Serializer.doSerialize(SerializerSession, Object)
    @Produces annotation

    The media types that this serializer can produce is specified through the @Produces annotation.

    However, the media types can also be specified programmatically by overriding the Serializer.getMediaTypes() and Serializer.getResponseContentType() methods.
